definition: منسوب mansūb related, brought into relation; attributed, ascribed, imputed (الى to s.o.); belonging, pertaining (الى to); relative (to), concerning, regarding (s.o. or s.th.); -- (pl. مناسيب manāsīb2) level, altitude; water level │ منسوب البحر m. al-baḥr sea level; مناسيب عالية (‘āliya) high water levels, high waters
